name: Lost Evolutions
description:
You're part of a rare species that can easily change.

You wake up in an unknown island, far from your family. There's a portal, but it's out of power. To go back, you'll need to use the power that only your species has, the power of fast evolution.

Special thanks for my sister, she made the trailer for the game!

Her channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4naHIKCrIwgeuMnqyQggTg
